item.description:
We are going to see Alice on the "BIG" screen. The movie opens in Imax on March 5th, but tickets are already on sale. Get your tickets early, before they are sold out!!

We will be seeing the 7:00 pm show. Due to the high demand and in order for us to get good seats and also be able to sit next to each other, let's meet next to the concession stand between 6:15 and 6:30 PM.

We will be going to the Reading location, so please make sure to purchase your tickets for the correct place. :-)

Hope to see you all at the movies!!


http://www.jordansima...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a TFS sign.
item.name: Movie Night - Alice in Wonderland in IMAX 3D
